Priority: Accelerate banking client migration through automation and POC innovation, establishing trusted advisor role in strategic project scoping
Metric: High Quality Deliverables / Client Delivery | Innovation | Client Partnership/Relationships

Reflection - Accomplishments: Built automated dataset validation tool reducing processing from 3min to 30sec per dataset using Python bulk curl scripting. Delivered 4 presentations to Senior Manager audiences (client and Accenture) with 3 POC demos for infrastructure-as-code and dataset migration automation. Leveraged Copilot, Windsurf, and agentic workflows for rapid development. Earned inclusion in strategic client scoping discussions; currently co-leading agentic AI project scoping with delivery lead.
Reflection - Business Impact: Processed 1,500 datasets saving ~62 hours of manual validation work. 6x speed improvement accelerated migration handoffs for client analytics/reporting. POC demonstrations showcased Accenture AI capabilities to senior leadership, generating pipeline opportunity with 1 POC advancing to formal pitch stage. Earned trusted advisor role in client discussions, influencing project scoping and resource planning—elevated impact beyond typical Senior Analyst scope.
Reflection - Challenges Overcome: Unified validation framework across heterogeneous dataset formats and migration types. Balanced POC innovation with delivery commitments through effective time management. Adapted technical content for mixed business/technical senior audiences. Built credibility to earn strategic discussion access typically reserved for senior consultants. Navigated ambiguity in new agentic project through structured discovery approach.
Reflection - Development & Learning: Mastered AI-assisted development: Copilot, Windsurf, agentic frameworks. Developed spec-driven development expertise using prompt engineering and instruction dotfiles. Strengthened executive presence through Senior Manager exposure. Gained client engagement and project scoping experience. Recognized by delivery lead and tech leadership as thought leader in AI-enabled development for banking.
